text: jin logon ne apane paravaradigaar ka kahana maana unake lie bahut behataree hai aur jin logon ne usaka kaha na maana (qayaamat mein unakee ye haalat hogee) ki agar unhen rue zameen ke sab khazaane balki usake saath itana aur mil jae to ye log apanee najaat ke badale usako (ye khushee) de daalen (magar phir bhee koee phaayada nahin) yahee log hain jinase buree tarah hisaab liya jaega aur aakhir un ka thikaana jahannum hai aur vah kya buree jagah hai
